dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Dr. Ray Watts mentioned they had almost 300 Covid patients at a time, with 30% in the ICU.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Dr. Ray Watts mentioned they had almost three hundred Covid patients at a time, with thirty percent in the I C U.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Weve had almost up to 300 Covid patients at a time with 30% in an ICU, says President Dr. Ray Watts.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and he really emphasized the resilience of the employees, you know, working through all that stress without complaint.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and he really emphasized the resilience of the employees, you know, working through all that stress without complaint.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: They have done it without complaint. The resilience of our employees during these times of greater stress had been remarkable.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Right, and more than half of them are at the University of Alabama at Birmingham Hospital, which is huge—one of the 20 largest in the U.S.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, and more than half of them are at the University of Alabama at Birmingham Hospital, which is huge-one of the twenty largest in the U.S.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: More than half of Watts employees work at the University of Alabama at Birmingham Hospital, which is among the 20 largest hospitals in the United States.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: They set up this massive warehouse, like 20,000 square feet, just for storing PPE. Over 100,000 masks, millions of gloves...
dialogue_turns.tts_text: They set up this massive warehouse, like twenty thousand square feet, just for storing P P E. Over one hundred thousand masks, millions of gloves...
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: After an outpouring of donations from the community and the university, the hospital had to open a 20,000 square foot warehouse, where it now stores more than 100,000 masks, 150,000 reusable isolation gowns and 5.5 million exam gloves.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And they provided mental health resources too, including a wellness app developed at the university. That's pretty forward-thinking.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And they provided mental health resources too, including a wellness app developed at the university. That's pretty forward-thinking.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: All employees were also given access to mental health resources, including a mental wellness app developed at the university.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: No wonder they topped Forbes' list of America's Best Large Employers for 2022. That's a big deal.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No wonder they topped Forbes' list of America's Best Large Employers for twenty twenty two. That's a big deal.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: These actions, among other initiatives, helped UAB secure the top spot on Forbes list of Americas Best Large Employers 2021.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. And it wasn't just UAB—Yale, University of Michigan, Ohio State all made the top 20 as well.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely. And it wasn't just U A B-Yale, University of Michigan, Ohio State all made the top twenty as well.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: UAB isnt the only university to rank highly: the top 20 includes Yale University (No. 5), the University of Maryland, Baltimore (No. 13), Ohio State University Wexner Medical Center (No. 14), the University of Arizona (No. 16), the University of Michigan (No. 17) and the University at Buffalo (No. 19).

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: What I found interesting was that UAB gives employees an $8,000 grant if they buy or renovate a home nearby. That's investing in the community.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: What I found interesting was that U A B gives employees an eight thousand dollars grant if they buy or renovate a home nearby. That's investing in the community.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: As a means of investing in its employees and the vitality of its campus neighboring towns, every employee who buys or renovates a home in the surrounding area is given an $8,000 grant, he says.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Plus subsidized childcare during the pandemic. And they developed that contact-tracing app, GuideSafe, which got used all over the country.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Plus subsidized childcare during the pandemic. And they developed that contact-tracing app, GuideSafe, which got used all over the country.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The university has also provided many employees with subsidized childcare during the pandemic. Hundreds of thousands of people not only in Alabama but around the country have used this, he says.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Innovation like that really shows they value their people. Meanwhile, Netflix came in at number 21, offering some amazing benefits too.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Innovation like that really shows they value their people. Meanwhile, Netflix came in at number twenty one, offering some amazing benefits too.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Ranking at No. 21 is another company thats helped customers and employees weather the past year: Netflix.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Oh yeah, unlimited parental leave, up to $75,000 for fertility or adoption support... even mindfulness apps and coaching platforms.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh yeah, unlimited parental leave, up to seventy five thousand dollars for fertility or adoption support... even mindfulness apps and coaching platforms.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: While the streaming service has offered customers a cure to their pandemic boredom, its offered employees access to mindfulness app Headspace and text-based coaching platform Ginger. Though Netflix co-CEO Reed Hastings was famously quoted last fall as saying he isnt a fan of remote work, his companys benefits packagewhich includes unlimited paid parental leave (though new parents typically take between four and eight months) and $75,000 to support fertility, surrogacy or adoptionaffords employees ample work-life balance.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And they cover backup care for kids, elders, even pets through Care.com. That's next-level support during tough times.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And they cover backup care for kids, elders, even pets through the website. That's next-level support during tough times.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Netflix also recently introduced an education reimbursement of up to $6,000 for employees children during the pandemic, this in addition to covering the cost of child, elder, adult or even pet backup care for up to 10 days through Care.com in the U.S.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: The survey behind the list was massive—50,000 Americans anonymously rating their employers. Makes the ranking feel really credible.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The survey behind the list was massive-fifty thousand Americans anonymously rating their employers. Makes the ranking feel really credible.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: To determine the list, Statista surveyed 50,000 Americans working for businesses with at least 1,000 employees. All the surveys were anonymous, allowing participants to openly share their opinions.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: For sure. It's all about whether employees would recommend their workplace to others, and these companies clearly earned that trust.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure. It's all about whether employees would recommend their workplace to others, and these companies clearly earned that trust.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The respondents were asked to rate, on a scale of zero to 10, how likely theyd be to recommend their employer to others.
